summary: Comprehensive testing of Calius Digital website completed successfully. Backend APIs working excellently (93.8% success rate), frontend fully functional with all pages loading correctly, navigation working, language toggle functional, and all core features operational.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 400 instead of expected 500 for Midtrans not configured
minor_issues.impact: Very low - both status codes indicate same issue (Midtrans not configured)

passed_tests: Homepage loads with all sections (hero, services, templates, portfolio, testimonials, CTA)
Navigation bar works - all links navigate correctly
Services page displays 4 services with pricing information
Templates page shows template cards with working category filters
Template Buy Now button opens functional checkout dialog
WhatsApp buttons present and functional across all pages
Portfolio page displays projects with category filters
Pricing page shows pricing packages with amounts
Contact form validation and submission working
All 15/16 backend API endpoints working correctly
Contact form submission to backend successful
Template checkout dialog functional (payment fails as expected without Midtrans keys)
